intent_atoms.description: ParseIssue data must be propagated into ParseTreeStore snapshots so that outline rows receive per-node corruption context.
Render accessible badges with tooltip and VoiceOver support for corruption summaries in the parse tree outline view.
Outline filters and accessibility helpers must factor in tolerant parsing issues while keeping previews representative.

functional_units.name: ParseIssue Data Propagation
functional_units.description: Propagates ParseIssue data into ParseTreeStore snapshots so outline rows receive per-node corruption context.

functional_units.name: Corruption Summary Model in Outline Row
functional_units.description: Extends ParseTreeOutlineRow with a CorruptionSummary model and renders accessible badges with tooltip and VoiceOver support.

functional_units.name: Updated SwiftUI List Rendering
functional_units.description: Updates the SwiftUI list to render accessible badges for corruption nodes.

functional_units.name: Outline Filters Updated for Tolerant Parsing
functional_units.description: Modifies outline filters and accessibility helpers to factor in tolerant parsing issues while keeping previews representative.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Support Enhancements
functional_units.description: Adds VoiceOver support and tooltip for badges.
